javax.media

Class StopEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • javax.media.ControllerEvent
        • javax.media.TransitionEvent
          • javax.media.StopEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MediaEvent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CAStopEvent, DataStarvedEvent, DeallocateEvent, EndOfMediaEvent, NoComponentSelectedEvent, RestartingEvent, ServiceRemovedEvent, StopAtTimeEvent, StopByRequestEvent, StopByResourceLossEvent

    public class StopEvent
extends TransitionEvent
    StopEvent is a ControllerEvent that indicates that a Controller has stopped.
    Version:
    1.28, 97/08/23
    See Also:
    Controller, ControllerListener, Serialized Form
